Emerging growth company &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act. &#9744; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; Item 1.01 Entry into a Material Definitive Agreement. &#160; On August 27, 2021 , Tesla Energy Operations, Inc. and The Research Foundation for the State University of New York entered into Amendment #12 to the Amended and Restated Agreement for Research &#38; Development Alliance on Triex Module Technology (the &#8220; Agreement &#8221;), to memorialize an update of job and investment milestones required pursuant to the Agreement as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic. &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; SIGNATURES &#160; Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned hereunto duly authorized. &#160; &#160; &#160; TESLA, INC. &#160; &#160; &#160; By: &#160; /s/ Zachary J. Kirkhorn &#160; &#160; Zachary J. Kirkhorn Chief Financial Officer Date: August 30, 2021 &#160; &#160;
